Websites aren't just something we do. They're our specialty.

The three pillars every engagement includes: design, dependable engineering, and proactive care. Every engagement starts with a clear website outcome, so explore the most common builds we ship and watch a quick preview as you browse.

  • Landing Pages

    High-converting landing pages with persuasive creative, CRM-connected forms, and analytics-ready tracking to capture leads and drive action

    Professional multi-page websites for service businesses, personal brands, and local companies complete with tailored navigation, conversions, and SEO foundations

  • Blogs

    Content-focused blog websites with editorial workflows, custom categories, and SEO tooling to share your expertise and build authority

  • Restaurant Websites

    Specialized websites for restaurants, cafes, and food service teams with menu displays, reservations, and delivery integrations

  • E-Commerce Websites

    Full-featured online stores with product management, secure payments, and marketing automations to sell products and services online

  • Custom Full-Stack Applications

    Bespoke web applications built to your exact specifications with custom workflows, secure data layers, and scalable architecture
About Griffin's Web Services
Decorative border sweep

Websites that make your business look credible, fast, secure, and easy to manage from day one.

We build and manage websites that look elite, load instantly, and keep working long after launch so you never have to juggle multiple vendors again.

Griffin's Web Services builds fast, secure, professional websites for businesses that want a strong, trustworthy online presence without any technical headaches.

Our focus is simple: make your business look credible, make it easy for customers to reach you, and keep your website running smoothly around the clock.

Not another template factory.

Unlike the bloated DIY builders flooding the internet, our websites do not fall apart when real customers start using them.

We scope every project around your services, operations, and goals so the finished site feels tailor-made and never like a generic skin.

We handle everything.

You do not need to manage hosting, updates, or security issues ‚Äî we handle the nitty-gritty so you can stay focused on the work you care about.

From discovery to launch to ongoing improvements, you get one accountable partner who keeps your site running flawlessly.

‚ÄúA website should do two things extremely well: be easy for your customers to use and be structured in a way that search engines are confident recommending.‚Äù

Griffin Surett Founder & CEO, Griffin's Web Services

Most websites are completed within 7-14 days depending on complexity. Simple landing pages often launch in 3-5 days, while e-commerce sites or custom applications can take 2-4 weeks. You'll get a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

Our ongoing support covers 24/7 monitoring, security updates, content edits, technical assistance, regular backups, performance tuning, and monthly analytics. Think of it as having a dedicated web team keeping everything fast, secure, and up to date.

Yes. We create secure shops with products, payments, shipping and tax rules, and inventory. We also connect your CRM, email, and analytics so everything stays in sync.
